feed.title: DevRider - Blog
feed.subtitle: A Blog between motorcycle and development

entry.title: Starting a new journey
entry.content:
The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
-- Mark Twain

Finally, taking the time

After several attempts, I finally set up a clean and simple blog. This blog will treat about my job and my main passions: Development and motorcycle related content. This blog may also include some filmmaker stuff and so on.

If you want to know more about me, you can read the About page.

To be continued ...
